mapper.insert: insert into SUPPLIERS (SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_NAME, CONTACT_NAME, ADDRESS, CITY, POSTAL_CODE, COUNTRY, PHONE) values (#{supplierId},#{supplierName},#{contactName},#{address},#{city},#{postalCode},#{country},#{phone})
mapper.select: select * from Blog SUPPLIERS where SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName}
select * from Blog SUPPLIERS where SUPPLIER_ID = #{value}
mapper.update: update Author set SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName}, ADDRESS = #{address}, CITY = #{city}, POSTAL_CODE = #{postalCode}, COUNTRY = #{country} PHONE = #{phone}, where SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}
